name: Pumpkin Run (itch) (OFFLINE, niraami)
description:
Stay ahead of the carve and make your way to the finish!

Tackle unique parkour and puzzle-like challenges as a sentient pumpkin!  Challenge yourself to beat the levels as fast as possible, try to collect all of the seeds which mark the toughest spots on the maps, or do both at the same time if you dare!

This game was made for One Minute Game jam #8!
Special thanks to niraami or helping out with coding and mapping!

While a WebGL build is available, I highly recommend downloading and playing the .exe for a much smoother, higher quality experience with better graphics!
